15,01  04 14,04##00,01  13""04"13m04m00 11m10m15 14#15 14,11#11,01m 04""15"14,15  15,01m"" 11""m15 "00,00##00,15#15,01"14,14 14,01"15  14,14#14,01"00,15"15,01"14"04""14#15 11m15 14#15 11m15  "14""14,04#04,01""15 11#04   #  m13m13,04m04,01m"13"04

15,01       04"15 14,04#13,01""""04""15 13,04"04,01"15  14#00 04""15       11#15        11#15 14#15        11#15        11"#15         04#
15,01         04#

14,01     Hi guys, I just wanted to say how good it feels to draw ansis again.
14,01 15   14  It's an incredible medium and honestly I couldn't imagine all these
14,01    years without ansis, where I was spending all my time in aciddraw and 
14,01 15  14   on the bbs's.15 14It was definatly the beginning of my artistic career.

15,01  14Pierre-Luc Grosleau
15,01>
